alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Campbell; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 3:29PM CDT until July 25 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Anderson County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Campbell County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Union County in east Tennessee... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of La Follette, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Norris, Big Ridge State Park, Andersonville and Norris Dam State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
